price: 24. O’kati na yango bakoyoka mopepe ya kitoko te mpe bakomela eloko te,
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
